div.p:
I am directed by Governor Sir G. Bowen to forward for your information a copy of a despatch received by His Excellency from the Secretary of State for the Colonies.
See M. Hicks Beach to G. Bowen, 19 August 1878 (Unit 32A, VPRS 1987 despatches of the Secretary of State to the Governor, vol. 32, pt 2, July-December 1878, VA number, Public Record Office, Victoria), enclosing a printed copy of J. Hooker to R. Meade, 24 July 1878 (in this edition as M78-07-24) and requesting the Governor to show both letters to M. See also M to G. Bowen, 17 November 1878, and M to H. Pitt, 17 November 1878 (in this edition as 78-11-17a). An annotation on Hicks Beach's despatch indicates that copies of the two documents were also sent by Bowen to Govrnment Ministers.
